amendment.description: To encourage the investment of foreign earnings within the United States for productive business investments and job creation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 622 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 622 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 75 - 25. Record Vote Number: 165.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 622.

Amendment SA 622 proposed by Senator Ensign. (consideration: CR S6239-6241; text: CR S6239-6240) To encourage the investment of foreign earnings within the United States for productive business investments and job creation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 622 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 622 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 75 - 25. Record Vote Number: 165.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 622 proposed by Senator Ensign.
